Room.Name: Main Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Main Street, one of the busiest streets in Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: To the north and south continue Main Steet. To the west you can see a shoppe with a large wooden sign hanging in front of it. The sign has a shield on it that says, "Discount Armor." Another armor shop is a little farther north, on the other side of the street, next to the park.
